message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your daily routine or professional tasks. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $150. I'm confident it will provide great value to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your budget constraints. In light of that, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to offer the product to you for $140. This price reflects a compromise while still allowing us to cover our costs and maintain our business operations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $140 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $120, as I mentioned earlier. Is there any flexibility to meet me at that price?
